title: A South Beach Date Night that Dazzles
seo_title: A South Beach Date Night that Dazzles
more_content:
South Beach dazzles with romantic ambiance, from the turquoise waters to the world-class bars and eateries to dine at with your love. Want to escape to SoBe with your partner? Fall in love all over again with these ideas for things to do in SoBe for couples.

Take a Cruise around South Beach

Take to the water for a South Beach boat ride. For something fun and carefree, hop on a Duck Tour for a 90-minute trip cruising Ocean Drive before plunging into Biscayne Bay in the amphibious vessel. Sail the waters around the islands of the rich and famous on the Millionaire’s Row boat tour. The 90-minute experience takes you by Star Island, Venetian Islands, Palm Island, Hibiscus Island, and more for a peak at how celebrities live in Miami.

Reconnect with a Couples Massage

Be in the moment, relax your mind, and deepen your bond with a couples massage. Take the 7-minute walk from Celino to Tao Spa Miami for the ultimate couples massage packages. Get massaged in the same room with your choice of Swedish or Deep Tissue massage, designed to maximize flexibility, reduce muscle tension, and increase overall wellness. Couples foot massages, hot stone therapy, and reflexology packages are also available.

Catch the Sunset from the Beach

The beach is always an ideal place to connect with your loved one. Build a giant sandcastle, watch the sunset over Miami Beach, spend the evening tossing a frisbee, or pack a moonlight picnic with your favorite SoBe takeout to share in the sand. Simply cross Lummus Park from the Celino Hotel and you’re there.

Spice it up with Dinner for Two

You don’t have far to look for a delicious, intimate meal when you stay at Celino. Enjoy dinner or late night bites at our new Pubblica restaurant. Authentic Italian cuisine mingles with South Florida ingredients in a harmonious balance of food, culture, and design. Enjoy artisanal breads and pastas, innovative cocktails, and esoteric wines in a gorgeous old world-style setting.

For elegant seafood-centric cuisine, reserve a table for two at Dalia. Fresh oysters, wood-fired fare, and modern twists on classic Mediterranean plates will tantalize the palate. After dinner, grab a drink at Dalia’s ultra-chic horseshoe cocktail bar before taking on the town.

Add Dance Lessons to your Date Night

Drop in and dance the night away at Mango’s Tropical Cafe. From the Celino, take the short 4-minute walk north along Ocean Drive for their nightly Sip, Savor, & Salsa lessons. Celebrate date night with a meet and greet mixer, sip mojitos, and learn to dance Salsa and Bachata like a pro. After the lesson, hang out in Mango’s nightclub with colorful cabaret and live music until 5 a.m.

Plan your Romantic Escape to Celino Hotel

Follow the Celino Instagram and post a photo using #BeSeenCelino to show us how you do date night in the new Celino District.

Celino Hotel opens its doors to extraordinary escapes, unmatched service, and unforgettable experiences in the heart of Miami Beach’s Art Deco District. Get to your exciting plans faster when you book direct with Celino South Beach. Book our exclusive Ocean Drive Romance package to receive 25% off our best available rate, a $100 food and beverage credit to enjoy at Pubblica and Dalia, complimentary valet parking, and Champagne on arrival.
